full_summary:
English Virtual Language Training for Central Region 
====================================================

### Request for Standing Offer

A Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for English virtual language training is intended to be issued. The procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and other applicable trade agreements.

### Tender Information

* Solicitation number: 100022228-Central-B
* Tender closing date and time: November 17, 2022, 14:00 pm
* Amendment number: 1
* Publication date: October 18, 2022
* Regions of opportunity/deployment: Canada (Central region, Quebec, Ontario, Manitoba, and National Capital Region)

### Description

The Government of Canada intends to issue a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for English virtual language training services in the following streams:

* Full-Time training (Group and Individual)
* Part-Time Training (Group and Individual)
* Learner Assessment
* Tutoring for Preparation to the Second Language Evaluation Tests
* Group Conversation

Training will take place during business hours for employees residing in the above regions. The RISO will be effective for two years and will include an option for three one-year extensions.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the submitted bid documents. The selection criteria are not specified, but the bidder must be able to provide services in all applicable work streams.

### Security Requirements

Security requirements are associated with this procurement. For more information, consult Part 6 – Security and Part 7 - Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses.

### Participating Entities

* Employment and Social Development Canada (contracting entity)
* Employment and Social Development Canada (end-user entity)
* Mimi Rabouin, NC Solicitations - GD (contact information)

### Supporting Documents

Tendering documents, including the Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) and attachments, are available on the Canada Buys website.
